meanings.definition: A formal meeting for discussion, especially one held by an academic society.
meanings.sent1: The symposia at the university allowed students to share their research findings.
meanings.sent2: The symposia on climate change brought together experts from around the world.
meanings.sent3: During the symposia, the professors debated the merits of different teaching methods.
meanings.sent4: The symposia acted as a melting pot of ideas and perspectives.
meanings.sent5: Attending the symposia was both informative and engaging.

meanings.definition: A collection of essays or papers on a particular subject, usually presented at a conference.
meanings.sent1: The symposia on ancient history included papers on various civilizations.
meanings.sent2: Researchers eagerly awaited the symposia on advancements in technology.
meanings.sent3: The symposia on gardening unexpectedly featured a paper on the history of tomatoes.
meanings.sent4: Her bookshelf was filled with symposia on diverse topics.
meanings.sent5: The symposia provided a wealth of knowledge on the subject.
